original_text: Always respect your father and your mother, as the Lord your God has commanded you. Then you will live for many years in the land that the Lord your God will give to you. And you will be happy.
korean_text: 너는 네 하나님 여호와께서 명령한 대로 네 부모를 공경하라 그리하면 네 하나님 여호와가 네게 준 땅에서 네 생명이 길고 복을 누리리라

sentences.original_text: as the Lord your God has commanded you
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 너의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 명령하심이니라

sentences.original_text: Then you will live for many years
that the Lord your God will give to you
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 하나님 여호와께서 네게 주실 땅에서
